articles.description: Google's cloud computing services division will also bring its Blockchain Node Engine to Solana beginning in 2023.

articles.title: How Stepn Plans to Keep Running Through the Bear Market

articles.description: Solana Labs’ upcoming Android phone can use Helium’s hybrid carrier, which fuses its decentralized network with T-Mobile’s 5G.

articles.description: With markets trading sideways, how's a degen supposed to make a buck these days? Many are looking to a one-click options strategy from Opyn.
articles.title: DeFi Speculators Turn to Ethereum ‘Squeeths’ and Straddles in Crypto 'Crab Market'

articles.description: A cause of death awaits an autopsy of the MakerDAO co-founder, who tweeted hours before being found dead on a Puerto Rican beach that he was the target of a murder plot.
articles.title: No Evidence of Foul Play in Death of MakerDAO Co-Founder Nikolai Mushegian, Police Say

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Coinbase earned $120 million in revenue from blockchain rewards in the first nine months of 2021. Over the same period in 2022, that grew by 77% to $213 million.
articles.title: Coinbase Earnings Shows Uneven Growth in Ethereum, Solana and Cardano Staking

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Scams connected to Monkey Drainer have netted attackers an estimated $4.3 million or more in NFTs and crypto assets.
articles.title: 'Monkey Drainer' Steals $800K in CryptoPunks, Otherside Ethereum NFTs

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The much-anticipated NFT project from the creators of DeGods has jolted Solana trading today following an October slump.
articles.title: Solana NFT Sales Surge 170% as y00ts Completes Delayed Rollout

articles.author: Tom Farren
articles.description: The music icon is a “day-to-day influence” on the growing NFT brand as it explores mainstream entertainment endeavors, Julian Holguin claims.
articles.title: Pharrell Williams 'Integral' to Ethereum NFT Project Doodles, Says CEO

articles.description: Brave founder and CEO Brendan Eich joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Web Summit 2022 to discuss how the  crypto-powered browser is weathering the bear market—and why Web3 needs to get serious about privacy.
articles.title: Brave CEO Brendan Eich: Web3 Isn't Taking Privacy Seriously Enough

articles.description: Farokh, founder of the DAO-governed NFT media brand Rug Radio, speaks to Mike Kriak of ConsenSys Mesh at Camp Decrypt: Napa. He talked about Rug Radio's origins, tokenization, sponsorship money during the bear market, and why it's called Rug Radio.
articles.title: The View from Rug Radio: Farokh Speaks at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Aave founder Stani Kulechov joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk about his vision for the next iteration of DeFi, Aave V3 and Lens Protocol, the Web3 company he wishes he had founded, and why now is the right time for the $5B lending protocol to launch its GHO stablecoin. Watch Episode 22 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Aave Founder Stani Talks Stablecoins and Next Era of DeFi

articles.description: Stacy Neale of Dacoco, producer of Alien Worlds, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson  at NFT Expoverse 2022 how Alien Worlds has a "DAO ecosystem" inside its game, and says it's "more than a game, more than DAOs, more than a  metaverse."
articles.title: In the Alien Worlds Metaverse Game, DAOs Are Game Pieces

articles.description: Bored Ape Yacht Club co-founders Wylie Aronow ("Gordon Goner") and Greg Solano ("Garga") joined Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin on the gm podcast to talk about BAYC parent company Yuga Labs and its size and influence in the space, Ape haters, NFT haters, the SEC investigating Yuga, Buzzfeed "doxxing" Aronow and Solano earlier this year, their vision for the Otherside metaverse realm, and much more. Watch Episode 21 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Meet the Bored Apes

articles.description: Cryptex CEO Joe Sticco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Cryptex is working with Chainlink and Coinbase Cloud to launch a token that tracks the performance of the entire NFT market and why such an asset might bring new people into NFTs and make the market more accessible.
articles.title: Cryptex Is Launching a Token That Tracks the Overall NFT Market Cap

articles.description: Ethereum co-founder and ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts on October 4 for a deep-dive chat on the Ethereum merge and aftermath, what's keeping the crypto market down, why he's super bullish on NFTs and the metaverse, whether it's really a multichain future, and much more.
articles.title: Joe Lubin: How the Ethereum Merge Went, Why ETH Is Down, NFTs, Metaverse, and the 'Killer App'
